TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit X509SecurityTokenHandler extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler

summary.span: 表示處理 型別的語彙基元的安全性權杖。

span.span: Represents a security token handler that processes tokens of type .

span.span: By default, the handler will perform chain-trust validation of the X.509 certificate.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::X509NTAuthChainTrustValidator ^ X509NTAuthChainTrustValidator { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::X509NTAuthChainTrustValidator ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::X509NTAuthChainTrustValidator ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定憑證驗證期間傳入的 X.509 憑證對應至 Windows 帳戶時，目前執行個體使用的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the that is used by the current instance during certificate validation when the incoming X.509 certificate is mapped to a Windows account.

value.span: X.509 憑證驗證程式，它會驗證指定的 X.509 憑證，並且驗證是否可以將憑證對應到 Windows 帳戶，以及該憑證鏈結是否可信任。

span.span: An X.509 certificate validator that will validate a specified X.509 certificate and verify whether the certificate can be mapped to a Windows account and whether the certificate chain is trusted.
